      • createWriter

        public Writer createWriter(ByteArrayId indexId,
                           ByteArrayId adapterId)
        Description copied from interface: DataStoreOperations
        Creates a new writer that can be used by an index.
        Specified by:
        createWriter in interface DataStoreOperations
        Parameters:
        indexId - The basic name of the table. Note that that basic implementation of the factory will allow for a table namespace to prefix this name
        adapterId - The name of the adapter.
        Returns:
        The appropriate writer
